title: Two 1887 N172 Old Judge John Roach cards.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: Two 1887 N172 Old Judge John Roach cards.
posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge John Roach batting-paper loss lower right, lower left and and to the left of his leg on the left side of the card-$80.00

1887 Old Judge John Roach pitching-corner rounding and staining on the back of the card. Also, a little residue mark to the left of the Old Judge banner at the top of the card as well as residue beneath Roach P. and N.Y.-$150.00

S/h is an additional $4.50 unless noted for the item. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
Attached Images
On neither of these cards is the back skinned.
I'll take the batting if still available
